channel.title: ScapeServer
channel.description:
[size=24pt][move][glow=red,2,300]THE START OF SCAPESERVER![/glow][/move]
Well,
Newty(Me) Went around asking some of the best coders From Rune-Server and Moparisthebest to code a 455 server. Some accepted and some declined. After a while, Azn, Thug Life(fr33sc4p3, Newty(me), Phonecheck, bob, Laura (Sleep), Tasty Noob, Boomer, and many others acepted. At the moment we are making a warm-up 377 server before we complete our 455 server + client. Once we get the 377 server to our likings, we will publicly release it on here, www.rune-server.org, and www.moparisthebest.com/smf. Then we will release our 455 client and server when we are done and have ran it for a while. Thats technicly it. :)
Although I will Post updates here, they will be posted first at [url=http://serverscape.org] ServerScape [/url]
So far on the 455: Phonecheck has gotten his Deobed 455 Working and Sleep has written a SkillCape handler. Updates to come xD.

item.title: ScapeServer
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

The basic 455 that I got my hands on doesn’t look all to complicated but the client heap space error when you start it. Silab said it might have something to do with the packets ;).

Read full topic

item.title: ScapeServer
item.dc:creator: @ryan123 ryan123
item.description:
@ryan123 wrote:

You need to shut the hell up and wack off to your fucking barbie dolls…I was asking questions this is the Development/help section right? So fuck off. oh and P.S. some guy needs your help turning PVP off…lol…

item.title: ScapeServer
item.dc:creator: @ryan123 ryan123
item.description:
@ryan123 wrote:

Dude…uhh im not paying money just to make a server not lag lol. If you guys were really good coders you could make it not lag without that…lol…jk…you guys are like 23344390932847734092837x better than me…but please make it as stable and not laggy as possible?=-]

Read full topic

item.title: ScapeServer
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

ryan123:

So…it’s basiclly another computer that is like so fast and all that its not funny and you host your server on it by basiclly hacking it?..lol

Not hacking it. You pay between $50 - $160 USD A month.

Read full topic

item.title: ScapeServer
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

ryan123:

Uhh, not to sound like a noob or anything but wtf is a VPS?

Virtual Private Server. Like an Ub3r Comp. to run your server on. But through remote desktop.
